players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I believe we should focus our votes on Charlie's last known actions and associations. Alice, you were seen talking to him the night he died. Can you explain that?"

Diana: "I have nothing to hide and was surprised by Charlie's sudden death as much as everyone else. Let us not jump to conclusions based on assumptions, but rather focus on gathering facts and evidence to help us determine what happened."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
